hero.subtitle: An AI-powered platform that turns every call into a real conversation — and every conversation into results.

features.header: What can Vocals do for you?
features.subtitle: Automate your calls. Get real answers.
features.item1_desc: Dial thousands of calls per day automatically, optimizing schedules and prioritizing contacts with the highest probability of response.
features.item2_desc: AI agents that adapt to each caller in real time — answering questions, handling objections, and moving the conversation forward naturally.
features.item3_desc: Classify leads or cases according to demographic criteria, key responses, and intent detected in the conversation.
features.item4_desc: Send real-time results to your CRM, database, or internal tools, without the need for manual supervision.

technology.title: Technology that works for you
technology.subtitle: Automate calls, capture information at scale, and improve your operations without adding complexity.
technology.point1: AI-powered mass dialing – 500 calls every 10 minutes.
technology.point2: Real conversations – Not scripts. The AI listens, understands, and responds.
technology.point3: Real-time analysis – Each response arrives structured and ready to act on.
technology.point4: 100% self-sufficient – Set it up once, let it run.

orchestrator.title: One platform to connect all your AI tools.
orchestrator.subtitle: Vocals sits between your phone system and your AI providers, routing every call through the best tools for the job — automatically, in real time.
orchestrator.byok_title: Your API keys. Your providers. Zero markup.
orchestrator.byok_desc: Connect your own accounts from OpenAI, ElevenLabs, Deepgram, Anthropic, or any supported provider. Vocals orchestrates them — you keep full control over your costs and your data. No hidden fees, no vendor lock-in.
orchestrator.card1_desc: You pay your providers directly at their standard rates. Vocals never adds a markup on top of your AI usage.
orchestrator.card2_desc: Change your voice, language model, or transcription engine from the dashboard — no code changes, no downtime.
orchestrator.card3_desc: Your API keys are encrypted at rest. Transcripts and call data are stored under your account only.

pipeline.title: The full voice pipeline, in real time.
pipeline.subtitle: Every stage streams simultaneously. No waiting. No batch processing. Just a natural conversation.
pipeline.step_twilio_desc: Inbound or outbound call. Audio streams over WebSocket.
pipeline.step_stt_desc: Deepgram, Whisper or Qwen. Transcription starts as the caller speaks.
pipeline.step_llm_desc: OpenAI, Claude, Gemini or Kimi. Contextual, multi-turn response generation.
pipeline.step_tts_desc: ElevenLabs, OpenAI or Resemble. Audio plays sentence by sentence, before LLM finishes.
pipeline.barge_in_desc: If the caller interrupts mid-response, Vocals detects it instantly and adapts — just like a real conversation.
pipeline.byok_desc: Your API keys, your costs. No markup.
